regime_update.implication: Break below minor-ii ($93.10) and the 0.50 retrace shelf (~$92.88) shifts the base case from 'Wave (5) advancing' to 'still corrective / deeper Wave ii or complex (4)'.

immediate_resistance.label: R2: 38.2% retrace of full 18.31→141.10 impulse (major pivot)
R4: prior key fib shelf (old 61.8 of 141.10→75.25 grid)

immediate_support.label: S3: 50% retrace of full 18.31→141.10 (major correction magnet)
S4: wave (4) low / structural floor (global bullish invalidation)
S5: 61.8% retrace of full 18.31→141.10 (deep correction target)

probabilities.note: Updated to reflect confirmed breaks below $93.10 and $92.50 plus bearish MACD alignment.

primary.name: Primary (Revised): Wave (5) still possible, but Wave ii of (5) is extending/deeper
primary.current_position: Treat the 75.25→110.50 move as early (5) / minor i, but the pullback is not finished: minor ii is extending toward fib supports (88.72, then 82.79).
validation_requirements: Reclaim and hold above $92.88, then $94.19 on a closing basis
MACD histogram turns back positive OR macd crosses above signal
RSI recovers back above 50 while price holds above $88.72

invalidation.rule: A sustained break below $75.25 invalidates the 'Wave (5) underway from 75.25' interpretation.

notes: Because the market broke below the prior minor-ii low, the bullish impulse must be treated as 'delayed' unless price quickly reclaims $92.88–$94.19.
ADX ~15 suggests weak trend; this favors corrective/complex behavior until proven otherwise.

alt1.name: Alternative #1 (Upgraded): ABC / WXY correction from 141.10 is active (C-leg risk dominates)
alt1.current_position: 141.10→75.25 is A (or W). 75.25→110.50 was B (or X). The break below 92.50 suggests the market has transitioned into C (or Y) downward, with initial targets at 88.72 then 79.70.
validation_requirements: Remain below $94.19 on closes (38.2% retrace of full impulse)
MACD remains bearish (macd < signal) with negative histogram
RSI fails to regain 50 on rallies

invalidation.rule: A decisive recovery above $110.50 would strongly argue against a C/Y down leg being underway.

downside_targets.label: C/Y-4: retest of A/W low (structural test)
C/Y-5: deep correction zone (61.8% retrace of full impulse)

notes: This scenario best fits the confirmed breakdown + bearish MACD configuration.
Oversold Williams %R (~-97) implies bounces are likely, but under this scenario they are expected to fail below major pivots ($94.19, $100.40).

alt2.name: Alternative #2 (Moderate): Complex (4) not finished (double-three / triangle-like), final flush still pending
alt2.current_position: The 75.25 low may be only part of (4). The 75.25→110.50 advance is an X-wave bounce within (4), and the market is now carving the Y-leg down toward 88.72–79.70 before a later (5) attempt.
validation_requirements: Price remains below the 50-MA and fails at $92.88–$94.19 on rebound attempts
ADX stays low (range/complex correction signature) while swings persist
MACD stays bearish but begins to flatten (typical of complex corrections)

invalidation.rule: A strong impulsive reclaim above $110.50 would reduce the likelihood that the structure is still (4).

notes: Alt2 differs from Alt1 mainly by expecting more sideways/choppy structure (time-consuming) rather than a clean trending C-wave.
